News.headline: Ron Paoletti Obituary
News.short_description: It is with great regret that we have to advise that Ron Paoletti sadly passed away last Sunday with heart failure aged 80.
News.description:
Ron, with his wife Pat, were supporters for over 20 years both home and away and active members of the Supporters Club.

For 10 years, up until this season due to Ron’s ill health, Ron & Pat would volunteer and sell programmes at the entrance to the Club House.

Our sincere condolences go out to Pat, their son Tony and his four children Peter, Steven, Michael and Gavin, and their daughter Julie and her four children Sammi, Toni, Charley and Harry, and also condolences to Mark, Roy, Ashley, Helen and Jennifer. 

The funeral will take place at the South Essex Crematorium, Corbets Tey on Thursday 6th April followed by a reception back at the Football Club.

Pat would welcome as many of their Daggers “family” to attend where possible.
